articles.description: Lower-than-anticipated allocations have spawned widespread confusion and concern in states, which are beginning to grasp the level of vaccine scarcity they will confront in the early going of the massive vaccination campaign.
articles.content: Instead of the delivery of 300 million or so doses of vaccine immediately after emergency-use approval and before the end of 2020 as the Trump administration had originally promised, current plans ca… [+12520 chars]

articles.title: Baker-Polito administration submits first vaccine order - WWLP.com

articles.content:
SPRINGFIELD, Mass. (WWLP) – The Baker-Polito administration has submitted an initial vaccine order to the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

articles.title: Nevada sets record with nearly 3,200 additional virus cases - KOLO
articles.description: The state reported 3,194 additional known cases and 29 additional deaths, increasing the state’s totals to 165,628 cases and 2,301 deaths.
articles.content:
CARSON CITY, Nev. (AP) - Nevada on Saturday reported a record of nearly 3,200 additional daily known COVID-19 cases and a record number of related hospitalizations.
